attributes.action: Rapid covid testing for weddings and receptions to go ahead.
attributes.background:
Give all guests/venue staff covid testing up 24 hours before wedding/reception.
To ease restrictions as a result of a negative test. To be able to take photos with loves ones without social distancing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561608
